name: geo
sql:
(type, ip) -> 
    multiIf(
        type = 'asn', toString(maxmind_asn_name(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'org', maxmind_asn_org(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'country', maxmind_country_name(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'subdivision1', maxmind_subdivision_1_name(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'state', maxmind_subdivision_2_name(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'city', maxmind_city_name(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'time_zone', maxmind_time_zone(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'metro_code', toString(maxmind_metro_code(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'continent', maxmind_continent_name(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'continent_iso_code', maxmind_country_iso_code(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'country_iso_code', maxmind_country_iso_code(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'locale_code', maxmind_locale_code(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'accuracy_radius', toString(maxmind_accuracy_radius(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'longitude', toString(maxmind_longitude(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'latitude', toString(maxmind_latitude(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'european_union',toString(maxmind_is_in_european_union(assumeNotNull(ip))),
        NULL        
    )
